payment_errors.generic_error: There was a problem processing your payment. Please try again or use a different payment method.
payment_errors.rejected_transaction: Your payment has been declined. Please try again or use a different payment method.
payment_errors.credit_card_processing: Your payment cannot be processed for technical reasons. Please try again in a few minutes or use a different payment method.
payment_errors.order_total_changed: The total of your order has changed. Please refresh your cart and try again.
payment_errors.payment_processing: Your payment cannot be processed for technical reasons. Please try again or use a different payment method.
payment_errors.paypal_zero_amount: You cannot use PayPal for %{amount} orders. Confirm that your order is correct and pay without PayPal.
payment_errors.paypal_invalid_token: PayPal was not available. Please try again or use a different checkout method.
payment_errors.pay_later_failed: There was an error processing your payment with Pay later. Please choose another payment method and try again.
payment_errors.three_d_secure_failed: Your payment cannot be verified. Please try again or use a different payment method.
payment_errors.three_d_secure_throttled: Too many attempts; wait a while before trying again
payment_errors.subscription_agreement_blank: Your payment details are saved when purchasing a subscription. Please confirm you agree or remove any subscriptions from your order to continue.
payment_errors.three_d_secure_failed_duplicate: The 3D Secure credit card authentication failed because another one is already in progress.
payment_errors.insufficient_funds: Your payment has been declined due to insufficient funds. Please try again or use a different payment method.

fraud_payment_errors.address_mismatch: Address and zip code do not match.

payment_errors.payment_processing_no_retry: Your payment cannot be processed for technical reasons. Try another payment method.

shipping_errors.shipping_method: Your cart has been updated and the previous shipping costs are not valid. Choose a new rate.
shipping_errors.shipping_method_not_available: Your cart has been updated and the items you have added cannot be shipped to your address. Please remove the items to complete your order.

shipping_method_not_available_generic.one: This order cannot be shipped to the address entered. Please check the address and make sure all fields are filled in correctly. Then try again.
shipping_method_not_available_generic.other: Some items in your shopping cart cannot be shipped to the address entered. Please check the address and make sure all fields are filled in correctly. Then try again.

shipping_method_not_available_updated.one: The item you've added won't ship to your location. Please remove this item to pay, or contact the store.
shipping_method_not_available_updated.other: One or more items you've added cannot be shipped to your location. Remove the items to pay, or contact the store.

processing.continue_to_payment_gateway_notice: Proceed to payment to add your payment details.
processing.continue_to_payment_gateway_notice_error: Your payment details cannot be verified.
processing.title: order is being processed
processing.you_will_receive_confirmation: We are currently receiving a lot of orders. You should receive a confirmation by email or text shortly. Let us know if you haven't received it within an hour.

medium.one: Your order is being processed. Estimated waiting time is 1 minute.
medium.other: Your order is being processed. Estimated wait time is %{count} minutes.

wait.long: You will receive an email as soon as your order has been processed. There is currently a large number of orders.
wait.no_auto_refresh_html: %{link} if you are not automatically forwarded.

processing.you_will_not_be_charged: No fees will be charged yet

failed_payment.title: Payment could not be processed
failed_payment.payment_not_processed_text: No fees have been charged. Return to your cart to complete your purchase.

thank_you.thank_you_confirmed_order_with_phone: You will soon receive a confirmation text message with your order number

thank_you.in_transit_description_days: Your order will be delivered within %{number} days.

thank_you.in_transit_description_tomorrow: Your order will be delivered tomorrow.
